title: Messari CEO Compares Trump to National Chemotherapy: A Disruptive Force in U.S. Politics
description: Ryan Selkis, Co-Founder and CEO of Messari, published a thought-provoking thread on the social media platform X on January 20, offering his perspective on former President Donald Trump’s political approach and leadership style. Selkis’s commentary, marked by frankness and critical analysis, explores various aspects of Trump’s persona and policy stances. Here are the key takeaways […]

title: Unveiling the Complex Realities of the Digital Afterlife Industry
description: In recent years, the emergence of digital afterlife technology, promising a unique connection with departed loved ones through AI-rendered avatars, has sparked curiosity and concern. A closer look at the documentary “Eternal You” by directors Hans Block and Moritz Riesewieck reveals a nuanced exploration of the industry, shedding light on the impacts and ethical considerations […]

title: AI Monitoring in Oregon Elections Sparks Controversy Amid Allegations of Censorship
description: The Oregon Secretary of State’s office finds itself embroiled in controversy as its use of artificial intelligence (AI) to monitor election information during the 2022 election cycle sparks a legal dispute. The allegations involve the identification of misinformation, disinformation, and malinformation (MDM) related to the electoral process, with the state facing scrutiny over potential suppression […]

title: ARK Invest Strengthens Position in Bitcoin with Purchases of its Own ETF
